channel.title: Rune Anarchy 317 - Development Team
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Rune Anarchy 317[/size]
Hello, and welcome to the Rune Anarchy 317 development team page. Rune Anarchy is going to be based off the Soul Split source. My name is James and I know basic java coding, I would like to become more experienced in coding and though a good way to learn would be by running an RSPS which would make my learning alot more fun.
[size=12pt][Positions][/size] [Coders] Server-side Coder: Me Server-side Coder: Open Client-side Coder: Open
[size=12pt][Website/Forums][/size] Website/Forums Manager: Me Website/Forums Manager: Open
[size=12pt][Publicity][/size] Head Publicist: Open
What Each Job Does...
[size=12pt]Server Coder:[/size] As server coder you will be working along me updating the current server content upto developing new server content.
[size=12pt]Client-Side Coder:[/size] As client side coder you will be making the webclient, adding models to the client files and keeping it updated to your best ability.
[size=12pt]Website Manager:[/size] Your job will be to work alongside me making the website and forums, I have started progress and plan to use SMF forums along with the mod simpleportal to make it a website with built in forums.
[size=12pt]Publicity:[/size] Your job will to create gfx, banners, and ads. You will need to spread the news of our server. You will stimulate the community. You are the head of all publicity.
Application Format Name? Aol\Skype\teamviewer\etc? What you are applying for? Why do you think that your the right person for the job?
Updated Features: Donarzone added [7/1/2011] Staffzone added [7/1/2011] Jail with teleblock [7/1/2011]
*Media Will Be Added Soon*
Contact me at: lcpdclan@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: Rune Anarchy 317 - Development Team
item.dc:creator: @cmckiller cmckiller
item.description:
@cmckiller wrote:

Name: Chris
Age: 15
Aol\Skype\teamviewer\etc : I use msn and teamviewer
What you are applying for : server sided coder
Why do you think that your the right person for the job : Because in the past i have owned, ran, hosted, coded over 20 different server sources so i think i’m the man for the job. I have no evidence at current but if you really want i can spend about 5 months on coding a server just to pove it. i have currently been away from the pc so i may be a little bit “rusty” but full order will continue within a few days

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Anarchy 317 - Development Team
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Hi, I am Quiting my server. I would like Work on your developing team and i want to request you Owner.
I will do
the Server Coding
Webclient
Mysql Stuff - Highscores - Vote4Cash
And other stuff…

And i want to request 30% of donations

Do you Accept or Refuse my Offer?

Read full topic

I would like to be head publicist I am vary good at advertising for servers hen I did it before I got well over 120 people ( day one) but after having 300 people on server my commuter crashed so now I’m just looking to help others

item.title: Rune Anarchy 317 - Development Team
item.dc:creator: @merk merk
item.description:
@merk wrote:

Staff Position: Head Graphics Designer, Or In-Game/Forums Mod, Publicity!!!

~Would Love To Be Head Administrator!

Experience:

@ Pk-Era Graphics Designer.
@ Pk-Era Head Graphics Forums Mod.
@ Sagi-x Head Admin/Head Graphics Designer

How active you are:

-Very 6-8Hours Perday in GMT [England] Timezone,
-Nearly Always on Forums, [iphone],

How do you plan on helping:

@ I Help everyone, Never Ignore, Always stay calm,
@ On Forums I Never Flame and Always answer in a correct and positive way,
@ If i was Head Gfx Designer i plan to boost the sites visitors by setting up various different advertising schemes,
@ also as Head Gfx Designer i would make the site and forums look alot more professional buy making a new banner, theme, forum rank tabs, and sigs and profile pics for everyone.

Would you ever donate:

@ Yes, I Plan to Soon,
@ And i Can Donate my Youtube acc to Sagi-x If i Get a Possition [Youtube has 500subs and Frequent Traffic, Boost Rune Anarchy 317 New Visitors]

Are you reliable and helpful:

@ Always am both,
@ Also Very Trustworthy,

You Can Ask Many People for Proof,

Any other information:

@ i Have Many Idea’s For this server and i will make them happen!,

Hopefully My Graphics Design/Advertising Can Improve Rune Anarchy 317 Over The Coming Year,

Kind Regards,

     -Merk-

Read full topic
